labels.label: Split FHIR Example XML Data according to Resource Type

entry.value: SELECT mr.subject_reference AS patient_uri ,mr.subject_display AS patient_display ,mr.id AS medicationrequest_uri ,mr.status AS medicationrequest_status ,mr.authoredOn AS medicationrequest_authoredOn ,mr.Med_id AS medication_uri ,IF( LENGTH(mi.coding_display) > 50, CONCAT(LEFT(mi.coding_display, 50), '...'), mi.coding_display ) AS medication_ingredient_display FROM medication_ingredient AS mi JOIN medicationrequest mr ON mi.id = mr.Med_id
